3: Boom—
The shaking on top of the train persisted for while.
Sophia supports Changyu with her mechanical arms while trying to maintain balance as she ventures forward in the carriages.
But before long, she sees Gray Raven retreating from the roof on the same steps she was just on.
After doing a double-take, she finally believes what she is seeing—Gray Raven was missing two Constructs.
You...
...I can still sense Lucia's and Lee's signals so they are not in any immediate danger...
I think I understand your situation.
(Cough...)
Changyu's condition... It's getting worse! What happened?
Overexerting himself in the fight just now made his injuries worse.
His circulation system module has been damaged and is losing vital fluids. He needs more precise maintenance.
I need to replace some essential repair modules.
There are quite a lot of mechanical equipment lying around, maybe you can use some of those?
Those are originally the maintenance machines on this train. I can use their parts for my external mechanic arms.
Changyu already fainted...
I may be overstepping, but I need to connect and monitor his M.I.N.D.
I can also relieve some of his pain.
...You can do that?
Then, please do.
I'll try my best to collect the maintenance modules.
Commencing connection to Changyu's M.I.N.D. now for monitoring. No need to worry about him...
